full_summary:
# Notice for RFP W8482-252683/A

**Request for Proposal (RFP)**
The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the purchase of [Pumping Units (Rotary)](#pumping-units-rotary)

## Tender Details
* **Solicitation Number**: W8482-252683/A
* **Reference Number**: CB-262-37262428
* **Amendment Number**: 2
* **Publication Date**: April 30, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 17, 2024 (14:00:00)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 15, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: December 13, 2024
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Trade Agreements**: Please refer to the Tender Description or Tender Documents

## Procurement Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Unspecified
* **Regions of Delivery**: British Columbia, Nova Scotia, Canada
* **Contracting Entity (Directorate) | Directorate Maritime Procurement**
	+ Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2
	+ Phone: (819) 939-3674
	+ Email: jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca

## Tender Description
The purchase of three (3) PUMP UNIT, ROTARY with the following specifications:

* **Part Number**: FF-704191
* **NCAGE**: 05563
* **Supplier**: Ingersoll-Rand Canada Inc
* **Unit of Issue**: Each
* **Delivery Locations**: CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia and CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia

Alternatively, bidders may propose equivalent or substitute products with the following information:

* **Brand Name and Model**
* **Part Number**
* **NCAGE**

**Important Notes**

* Bids shall be submitted in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

Download the Tender Description and other relevant documents at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/37240/rfp-w8482-252683-a-amd-1-en.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada
